subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description:
Coverage of all police force under EPS

Output 1: Police force is supported to perform their job effectively and efficently.
Output 2: Financial and project management capacity build within MoI.
Output 3: Police force is equipped with required equipment for improvmeent of their mobility and responsiveness.
Output 4: Improved working and living cnditions of police contributing to better efficiency and morale.
Output 5: Improved capacity in pplice force with enchanced gender balance.
donor_long: GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
DEPT OF FOR AFF & INTL TRADE GOV CANADA
